# Contact us

Did you know you can check account values, transfer funds, choose beneficiaries and much more online?

[Tax Center](https://www.tiaa.org/public/tax-questions-and-tax-information)

[Start a loan or withdrawalOpens in a new window](https://shared.tiaa.org/private/modecisionsupport/startwithdrawal)

[Required minimum distributionsOpens in a new window](https://shared.tiaa.org/private/mormd/rmdportal)

[Manage beneficiariesOpens in a new window](https://my.tiaa.org/private/partpreferences/beneficiary)

[Find your formsOpens in a new window](https://shared.tiaa.org/private/formsfactory/loadmytiaatransactions)

[Log in or register\\
Opens in new window](https://auth.tiaa.org/public/authentication/securelogin/authenticate)

Call us

## Find a TIAA phone number

Retirement accounts

[800-842-2252](tel:800-842-2252)

WEEKDAYS, 8 A.M. – 10 P.M. (ET)

Brokerage services

[800-842-2252](tel:800-842-2252)

WEEKDAYS, 8 a.M. – 7 P.M. (ET)

[More phone numbers](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/contact-tiaa/directory)

Find us

## Find a TIAA office or advisor

SEARCH NEAR THIS AREA, ENTER CITY, STATE OR ZIP CODE

![](https://www.tiaa.org/content/dam/tiaa/global/images/loader-white-bg.svg)

Send forms

## Skip regular mail, securely upload paperwork online

![](https://www.tiaa.org/content/dam/tiaa/public/images/dummy-img.png)

### Use our mobile app

Get the latest app now.

[Download on the app storeDownload from app store](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/tiaa/id341447597?mt=8)

[Get it on google play\\
Download from google play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mobile.tiaa.cref&hl=en)

![](https://www.tiaa.org/content/dam/tiaa/public/images/dummy-img.png)

### Use your Message Center

Upload from the Shared Files tab.

[Log in](https://auth.tiaa.org/public/authentication/securelogin?resume=/as/bpbyZ/resume/as/authorization.ping&spentity=null)

Other options

### [Send us a fax](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/contact-tiaa\#1016235185)

You can generally fax any document except beneficiary designations, name-change forms and related documents, and authorized forms for rollovers into TIAA. Please use our mail address for those documents.

Please do not fax voided checks or bank letters. These can be uploaded using your online account.

Fax TIAA documents to 800-914-8922

### [General mail](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/contact-tiaa\#1016921403)

P.O. Box 1259

Charlotte, NC 28201

### [Urgent/overnight](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/contact-tiaa\#1016983904)

8500 Andrew Carnegie

Charlotte, NC 28262

### [Mutual fund account forms](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/contact-tiaa\#1017044443)

TIAA-CREF Funds

PO Box 219227

Kansas City, MO 64121-9227

Find answers

## Commonly asked questions

[Browse FAQs](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/faqs)

### How can I contribute to my retail class mutual fund IRA?

[Find out how](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/faqs/retail-class-mutual-fund-accounts)

### When can I take money from my IRA?

[Find out when](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/faqs/withdrawals)

### How do I begin receiving retirement income?

[Learn how](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/faqs/forms-to-take-money-out)

### How are retirement plans taxed?

[Learn how](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/faqs/transactions-taxes)

### Are loans taxed?

[Get the answer](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/faqs/loans)

### How do I sign up for eDelivery?

[Sign up now](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/faqs/edelivery)

### How do I update personal information?

[Learn how](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/faqs/your-online-account)

### How do I change my beneficiary?

[Find out how](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/faqs/beneficiaries)

### Can I view recent transactions?

[See them here](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/faqs/edelivery)

[Previous](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/contact-tiaa#678589544) [Next](https://www.tiaa.org/public/support/contact-tiaa#678589544)

![](https://www.tiaa.org/content/dam/tiaa/public/images/dummy-img.png)

Invite friends & family

## Share TIAA with your friends & family

Financial well-being isn't about the size of a paycheck. For over 100 years, we've helped people like you who work at not-for-profit organizations.

Now we're inviting your friends and family to invest with us and take advantage of our financial services. Log in to start sharing.1

[Log in](https://auth.tiaa.org/public/authentication/securelogin?targetURL=/public/support/contact-us/referral)

1 Some TIAA products and services, like the Investment Solutions IRA and certain annuity products, are only available to employees and retirees (and their family members) of nonprofit colleges and universities, public and private nonprofit elementary and secondary schools, teaching hospitals, museums, libraries and other nonprofit institutions. [Learn more](https://www.tiaa.org/public/retire/financial-products/iras).

This material is for informational or educational purposes only and does not constitute a recommendation or investment advice in connection with a distribution, transfer or rollover, a purchase or sale of securities or other investment property, or the management of securities or other investments, including the development of an investment strategy or retention of an investment manager or advisor. This material does not take into account any specific objectives or circumstances of any particular investor, or suggest any specific course of action. Investment decisions should be made in consultation with an investor’s personal advisor based on the investor’s own objectives and circumstances.

metadata.description: Get in touch with us. Send a message, request a call, or find a TIAA office or ATM. Give us a call at 800-842-2252.
